p: Contrary to our third hypothesis, we observed neither an increase in facilitation with disturbance nor an overall facilitative effect by Silene on neither inside nor neighboring species. Our data show more negative RII values than expected (Supporting Information Figures A6, A7 in Appendix S1), indicating net competition within cushions and between cushions and neighboring species. We found no support of a disturbance effect on RII cov, RII shan, RII veg, and the Bray–Curtis dissimilarity index nor along our sampled elevational gradient (Table 3).
